description: The application SaveMe was made to send a SOS when you're in danger!   For this, SaveMe uses new communication technologies like Twitter, Facebook App, GTalk, Nabaztag that have already proved their success in helping people in danger or the more traditional methods such as Email, SMS or phone call.  SaveMe uses your built-in Palm GPS with the power of Google Maps! The application is multi-lingual English/French, use the Palm's built-in GPS as well as reverse geocoding to locate your address, you can ring an alarm to identify precisely where you are and launch a geotracking server on your phone.   The application uses your internet connection and is really FAST to use when you really need the app. Have Fun and get out safely with SaveMe. SaveMe is not a killer-app, but a SaveApp (#sfrjtd)!
